configuration.label: Google Analytics API key
configuration.description: Add Google Analytics tracking to your documentation site by providing an API key

configuration.label: Intercom API key
configuration.description: Add Intercom to your documentation site by providing an API key

configuration.label: Header Logo
configuration.description: Company logo to be shown on all pages inside the documentation site. 200x30px .svg or .png is recommended

configuration.label: Site Favicon
configuration.description: Documentation site favicon. 32x32px .png is recommended, using legacy .ico is discouraged

configuration.label: Meta Title Prefix
configuration.description: Meta title of the documentation page. Page name will also be added to the title

configuration.label: Meta Description
configuration.description: Meta description of the documentation site

configuration.label: Component Health Sheet Identifier
configuration.description: Google Sheets identifier that points to a google sheets file containing component health statuses

configuration.label: Component Health Sheet Name
configuration.description: Name of a specific sheet that containing component health statuses. Note that this is case sensitive

configuration.label: Page Title
configuration.description: Default color of the page titles. This can be further overridden per-page.

configuration.label: Page Description
configuration.description: Default color of the page description (optional text under the title). This can be further overridden per-page.

configuration.label: Custom CSS
configuration.description: Any custom CSS to change the documentation site styling. Custom CSS will be injected last, and can override any visual aspect of the site. For even deeper customization, check our developer docs > modifying exporter packages which allows you to completely change how documentation gets created.

configuration.label: Custom Javascript
configuration.description: Any custom javascript to change the documentation behavior. Custom JS will be injected last, and can be used for manipulating behaviors of the site. For even deeper customization, check our developer docs > modifying exporter packages which allows you to completely change how documentation gets created.

blocks.title: Markdown
blocks.description: Embed and process markdown from remote URL

blocks.title: Dynamic Health
blocks.description: Show component health information from API
